root: ^Mary: Jack, would you mind giving me a drink?
^Police: Sure I’ll give you a drink. You mean this whiskey?

s: ^Yes please. But just a small one. It might make me feel better.

c-0: ^Why don’t you have one yourself, you must be awfully tired. Please do. You’ve been very good to me.
^Police: Well, it’s not strictly allowed, but I might take just a drop to keep me going.
